entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued February 27 at 4:04PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...RAIN AND SNOW MELT WILL RESULT IN RISES ON SMALL STREAMS AND RIVERS IN PARTS OF EASTERN WASHINGTON AND NORTH IDAHO BY MID WEEK...
